name: Playbook for Malicious Script Execution Incident
description: This playbook mitigates an incident where an attacker used a Command and Scripting Interpreter to execute malicious scripts, leading to sensitive data extraction.

action--d3b2c6d2-c68b-48ea-aa96-5ac8ea7c.name: Kill malicious PowerShell process
action--d3b2c6d2-c68b-48ea-aa96-5ac8ea7c.description: Terminate the malicious PowerShell process executing on the system.

action--8f08f3c8-f9c4-4d0f-b7b9-3d1b0368.name: Isolate affected host from the network
action--8f08f3c8-f9c4-4d0f-b7b9-3d1b0368.description: Take the compromised host offline to prevent further data exfiltration.

action--d6b19aad-9eee-4226-9368-5bfa77e1.name: Perform malware scan on affected systems
action--d6b19aad-9eee-4226-9368-5bfa77e1.description: Run a malware scan on the isolated host to detect possible threats.

commands.command: for i in {1..3}; do scan_tool --target host-22; done

action--5071a7ae-4e02-4949-a885-3a8e4de9.name: Change passwords for all compromised accounts
action--5071a7ae-4e02-4949-a885-3a8e4de9.description: Reset the passwords for any accounts that may have been compromised.

action--f84e6b62-f9be-49c1-8b8f-347f097c.name: Monitor network traffic for suspicious behavior
action--f84e6b62-f9be-49c1-8b8f-347f097c.description: Set up monitoring for unusual network traffic to catch any further malicious activity.
